biotools.summary: Library and command-line tool for generating realistic-looking synthetic Electronic Health Records (EHR) data for testing purposes; optional plugin BadMedicine.Dicom for extending this to generating DICOM files.

bioschemas.name: BadMedicine
bioschemas.summary: Library and command-line tool for generating realistic-looking synthetic Electronic Health Records (EHR) data for testing purposes; optional plugin BadMedicine.Dicom for extending this to generating DICOM files.
